#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main() {
//	while(1) {
	long long i,m,n;
	scanf("%lld%lld",&m,&n);
	long long a[m];
	for(i=0;i<m;i++)
	scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
	sort(a,a+m);
	long long m1=a[m-1];
	if(n%2==0)
	{
		if(m1>(n/2))
		printf("NO\n");
		else
		printf("YES\n");
	}
	else {
		if(m1>(n/2+1))
		printf("NO\n");
		else
		printf("YES\n");
	}
//}
	return 0;
}
